trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway seeks your aid with Ways who dream of playing music.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Pipingway in Greatest Endsvale.
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Pipingway.
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SEQ_03<tab>Report to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Pipingway in Greatest Endsvale.

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Pipingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Pipingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Pipingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Pipingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Pipingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Pipingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Pipingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Pipingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_TODO_02<tab>Report to Managingway.

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, your timing is impeccable. I have good tidings─the melodies of the musicking station appear to have struck a proverbial chord with a number of our Ways, who have incidentally come to me with a request.

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>The music awoke something in them─the desire to play an instrument themselves. Naturally, we must nurture these burgeoning embers of passion within their hearts in a timely fashion, lest they be extinguished. I trust I can count on you?

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It seems even more of our Ways have developed an interest in playing an instrument. Might I ask for your help once more? Your support would mean the world to them.

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_MANAGINGWAY_000_004<tab>Assuming that's a yes, allow me to point you in the direction of Greatest Endsvale, where you will find Pipingway eager to share all of the details with you. Best of luck!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SUPPORTER4688_100_004<tab><beep> This supporter would be positively thrilled to replenish any and all necessary materials should the need arise!

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_010<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Allow me to bring you up to speed. We've already requested some of the engineers to draw up plans for fabricating wind instruments designed for paws like yours truly.

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_011<tab>That said, we can hardly cobble together a random assortment of materials and call it a day. No, we need the finest components─ones suited to making an instrument sing, and not...er, scream? That, my esteemed artisan friend, is where you come in!

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_013<tab>Good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Wouldn't you know it─after hearing us play our new instruments, a bunch of our fellow Ways are now hoping to join us. So many, in fact, that we frankly can't keep up with the demand!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_014<tab>So...erm, we could really use your help again!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_015<tab>Please see if you can craft a tuning slide with this assortment of delicate metals!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_016<tab>Please see if you can craft a pipe with these exquisite woods we procured from Etheirys!

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_017<tab>Please see if you can craft a lubricant with these materials! We must stick all manner of moving bits together, you know. Instruments are so delightfully odd!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_018<tab>Should you run out of materials, the doing supporter beside me can provide whatever you need.

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SUPPORTER4688_000_019<tab>How lovely, a materials request! <blip> <bleep> Bugger! It seems you already have a sufficient amount in your possession. You will have to deplete your present inventory before this supporter can assist you!

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SUPPORTER4688_000_020<tab>How lovely, a materials request! <blip> <bleep> Bugger! It seems you already have a sufficient amount in your possession. You will have to deplete your present inventory before this supporter can assist you!

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SUPPORTER4688_000_021<tab>How lovely, a materials request! <blip> <bleep> Bugger! It seems you already have a sufficient amount in your possession. You will have to deplete your present inventory before this supporter can assist you!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SUPPORTER4688_000_022<tab><blip> A materials request─how quaint! <beep> It is a delight to issue these supplies to you.
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SUPPORTER4688_000_023<tab><blip> A materials request─how quaint! <beep> It is a delight to issue these supplies to you.
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_SUPPORTER4688_000_024<tab><blip> A materials request─how quaint! <beep> It is a delight to issue these supplies to you.
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_030<tab>Do let me know when you've finished!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_031<tab>Oh, it's beautiful! We'll be able to make such wonderful instruments with this─not to mention music!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_PIPINGWAY_000_032<tab>I will take this marvelous component to the engineers. Thank you so much for lending us a paw, and do give Managingway my regards!
TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_MANAGINGWAY_000_033<tab>You are returned. And by your countenance, I take it you were able to assist them with their production woes.

TEXT_BANLOP102_04688_MANAGINGWAY_000_034<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You've played an instrumental role in helping our Ways see their dreams to fruition. I hope that you continue to do the same for others.
